When we plan events, the following should be informed/updated:

 {*} <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-pa|Mailing List]]</nowiki> - Subscribe and post

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=228|Forums]]</nowiki> - Sign up and post

 {*} <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PennsylvaniaTeam/EventsTeam|EventsTeam Page]]</nowiki> - Register with Launchpad and update page

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://ubuntupennsylvania.org/|Website]]</nowiki> - Send an email to lyz@ubuntu.com with details and/or links

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntupennsylvania.org/calendar/|Calendar]]</nowiki> - Send an email to kevin.valentine@gmail.com and alex.launi@gmail.com with details
